game.name: NeuroCorp
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Neurocorp is an online co-op horror game for up to 6 players set in a dystopian cyberpunk world. Collect subjects to extract lingering consciousness and scrap for upgrades, all while meeting the quota of the corporation that hired you and evading the dangers within.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Neurocorp is an online co-op horror game for up to 6 players set in a dystopian cyberpunk world. Collect subjects to extract lingering consciousness and scrap for upgrades, all while meeting the quota of the corporation that hired you and evading the dangers within.
